Summary: Better, Smoother Than Emeril's Big Easy Bold
text:
UPDATE! I just got my new Box and the seals problem is gone, the coffee is lovely, strong BROOKLYN STYLE ... with a low acidity that makes for a relaxing GOURMET cuppa Joe...Fuhgeddaboudit! Thans to BBR for being a terrific Amazon supplier! :-)

Well, I pre-ordered this terrific K-Cup, and had some problems with initial run of seals, and strength. Happily the folks at Brooklyn Bean will send me a FREE new box ... and btw you get 36 ct. boxes here not 24!

The coffee is smooth, strong and bold...a real "Brooklyn" cup of Joe...and it is very reminiscent of Emeril's Big Easy, only stronger and smoother, much smoother

Nice chocolate overtones to my palate.

So drink up Brooklyn and Fuhgeddaboudit!
